name: Space Invaders (itch) (Pulkit Bhandari)
description:
A Simple Retro style 2-d Space Invaders Game on Unity Engine.

Game play :-

There are 3 types of Enemies to avoid ,third one being the biggest with the max hp and also shoots bullets.

There are total 5 lives of the player which are reduced are by colliding with enemies or by encountering enemy bullets, after running out of all lives the game ends.

Top left corner shows current score while bottom right shows high score from previous game.There are 5 points for level 1 invader,10 points for level 2 invader and 15 points for level 3 invader. 

Controls :-

W,A,S,D keys to move and Space or Left Mouse Button to Shoot.

Objective :-

To get the maximum possible High score without Dying.
